summary: [ARTICOLO] “Love Yourself: Answer” dei BTS rimane nella classifica di Billboard per la sua 15° settimana consecutiva “L’ultimo...
body:
[ARTICOLO] “Love Yourself: Answer” dei BTS rimane nella classifica di Billboard per la sua 15° settimana consecutiva

“L’ultimo album della boy band K-pop BTS, “Love Yourself: Answer”, ha conservato questo mercoledì la sua presenza nella principale classifica settimanale di album di Billboard, estendendo la sua serie di successi alla 15° settimana.

L’ultimo componente della serie di “Love Yourself” si è classificato alla posizione n.84 della Billboard 200 tra i 200 album più popolari della settimana terminante il 15 dicembre, scendendo verso il basso di due posizioni secondo gli aggiornamenti della classifica.

È la quindicesima settimana di fila in cui l’album rimane in classifica dopo aver conquistato la cima della competitiva classifica all’inizio di settembre.

Nel giorno del suo rilascio a maggio anche il precedente album della boy band, “Love Yourself: Tear”, si era posizionato al primo posto della Billboard 200 ed è rimasto in classifica per 15 settimane di fila.

Per la settimana terminante il 15 dicembre, “Love Yourself: Answer” si piazza in cima alla classifica World Albums di Billboard, mentre “Tear” prende la terza posizione. Il quarto posto lo reclama “Love Yourself: Her”, l’altro album della trilogia “Love Yourself” dei BTS.

I BTS reclamano anche il primo posto della Billboard Social 50 per la 74° settimana consecutiva, il periodo più lungo mai registrato nella storia della classifica.”

Traduzione a cura di Bangtan Italian Channel Subs (©lynch) | ©YonhapNews

blog.description: This blog is an AUTOMATED blog that uses an IFTTT algorithm to instantly post fics posted under the relationships of All ships in BTS

summary: baby, tell me we'll be alright
title: baby, tell me we'll be alright
body:
by chim_chimni

Jimin had always hated the silence but now, he would rather the silence envelope him.

He thinks he dislikes the words Yoongi was throwing at him more than he could ever hate the silence.

“You had no right.” Yoongi jabs a finger in his direction. Those four words reminds Jimin of heartbreak and he braces himself for the rest of Yoongi’s words, knowing he wouldn’t get out of it unscathed.

or in which Yoonmin fight, Yoongi screws up and Jimin’s every insecurity comes to life.

Words: 2444, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 방탄소년단 | Bangtan Boys | BTS
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings, No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Park Jimin (BTS), Min Yoongi | Suga, Kim Taehyung | V, Kim Namjoon | RM, Jung Hoseok | J-Hope, Kim Seokjin | Jin, Jeon Jungkook
  • Relationships: Min Yoongi | Suga/Park Jimin, Minor or Background Relationship(s), Kim Namjoon | RM/Kim Seokjin | Jin
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Non-Famous, Choreographer Park Jimin (BTS), Producer Min Yoongi | Suga, Hurt Park Jimin, lets b honest when do i not write hurt jimin???, Min Yoongi | Suga Is Bad at Feelings, Min Yoongi messes up, Sad Park Jimin (BTS), Sad Min Yoongi | Suga, Kim Taehyung | V Is a Good Friend, Jeon Jungkook & Park Jimin Are Childhood Friends, Angst with a Happy Ending, Angst and Hurt/Comfort, Park Jimin Is Bad at Feelings, because im bad at feelings, Established Min Yoongi | Suga/Park Jimin, Park Jimin Needs a Hug, Insecure Park Jimin, Min Yoongi | Suga Is a Little Shit, Crying Park Jimin

title: Incognito
body:
by TamaTaco

Park Jimin, on of the rising star soloists in Seoul, South Korea is hated by his bookworm crush Jeon Jungkook. To ever talk or get close to him he disguise him self as his made up character “Min” what will happen if Jungkook finds out who “Min” is…?

summary: BTS And IU Receive Awards From Journalists Federation Of Korea
title: BTS And IU Receive Awards From Journalists Federation Of Korea
body:
New Post has been published on http://www.btsvfan.com/bts-and-iu-receive-awards-from-journalists-federation-of-korea/

BTS And IU Receive Awards From Journalists Federation Of Korea

BTS and IU have been chosen as recipients of awards from the Journalists Federation of Korea!

On December 11, the Journalists Federation of Korea announced the 12 winners of the 18th Proud Korean Awards. BTS and IU are the only two celebrities to make the list.

BTS has been named the winner in the music category for artists who enhance the nation’s prestige, while IU has been given the Donation Angel award.

The award ceremony will be held at 2:30 p.m. KST on December 12 in Seoul.

BTS will be performing at the 2018 Mnet Asian Music Awards on December 12 in Japan, as well as at the ceremony’s finale in Hong Kong on December 14. IU has been celebrating her 10th debut anniversary with concerts both within Korea and abroad, and recently featured on Kim Dong Ryul’s song “Fairy Tale.”

Congratulations to BTS and IU!

summary: stray kids are armys and it's so cute... they look up to them so much and value their words. minho got a surge of energy just...
body: stray kids are armys and it’s so cute… they look up to them so much and value their words. minho got a surge of energy just being able to perform in front of them as a stray kids member and not a backup dancer. chan and felix find their work to be admirable and all the boys love their stages. we love a healthy junior/senior relationship!
